爱好.Definition: àihǎo - to like, to take pleasure in, interest, hobby

办公室.Definition: bàngōngshì - office, business premises, bureau, CL:間|间[jian1]

帮忙.Definition: bāngmáng - to help, to lend a hand, to do a favor

北方.Definition: běifāng - north, the northern part a country

种.Definition: zhǒng - (measure word for kinds, sorts, types)

比较.Definition: bǐjiào - to compare, to contrast, comparatively, relatively

比赛.Definition: bǐsài - game; match; competition; to compete

如.Definition: rú - as, as if, such as

必须.Definition: bìxū - to have to, must, compulsory, necessarily

当.Definition: dāng - to serve as; to be

变化.Definition: biànhuà - change, variation, to change, to vary

别人.Definition: biérén - other people, others, other person

参加.Definition: cānjiā - to participate, to take part, to join

实.Definition: shí - solid; reality (e.g. 事实的 -- fact)

把.Definition: bǎ - (measure word for bunches of things, and chairs)

除了.Definition: chúle - besides, apart from (... also...), in addition to, except (for)

打扫.Definition: dǎsǎo - to clean up (a room, apartment or house)

向.Definition: xiàng - direction, to face, to turn toward

锻炼.Definition: duànliàn - to engage in physical exercise, to work out, (fig.) to develop one's skills

化.Definition: huà - to transform; to influence (e.g. 化学 -- chemistry)

耳朵.Definition: ěrduo - ear, CL:隻|只[zhi1],個|个[ge4],對|对[dui4]

声.Definition: shēng - sound, voice, tone, noise, classifier for sounds

放心.Definition: fàngxīn - to feel relieved, to feel reassured, to be at ease

刚才.Definition: gāng cái - just now, a moment ago

结.Definition: jié - to tie, to bind, knot

接.Definition: jiē - to receive; to welcome, to go meet

关心.Definition: guānxīn - to be concerned about, to care about

关于.Definition: guānyú - pertaining to, concerning, with regard to

还是.Definition: háishi - or, still, nevertheless, had better

害怕.Definition: hàipà - to be afraid, to be scared

像.Definition: xiàng - to be like; to look like; to take after, portrait

黄河.Definition: huánghé - Yellow River or Huang He

回答.Definition: húidá - to reply, to answer, the answer

会议.Definition: hùiyì - meeting, conference, CL:場|场[chang3],屆|届[jie4]

求.Definition: qíu - to seek, to look for, to request

张.Definition: zhāng - (measure word for flat objects, paper, pictures, etc.)

见面.Definition: jiànmian - to meet, to see each other, CL:次[ci4]

根.Definition: gēn - root, basis, classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes

街道.Definition: jiēdào - street, CL:條|条[tiao2], subdistrict, residential district

节目.Definition: jiémù - program, item (on a program), CL:臺|台[tai2],個|个[ge4],套[tao4]

议.Definition: yì - to comment on, to discuss, to suggest

结婚.Definition: jiéhūn - to marry, to get married, CL:次[ci4]

元.Definition: yuán - (measure word for unit of Chinese currency); yuan

结束.Definition: jiéshù - termination, to finish, to end, to conclude, to close

解决.Definition: jiějué - to settle (a dispute), to resolve, to solve

调.Definition: tiáo/diào - to harmonize, to reconcile, to transfer

经常.Definition: jīngcháng - frequently, constantly, regularly, often, day-to-day

经过.Definition: jīngguò - to pass, to go through, process, course

经理.Definition: jīnglǐ - manager, director, CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]

决定.Definition: juédìng - to decide (to do something), to resolve, decision

客人.Definition: kèrén - visitor, guest, customer, client, CL:位[wei4]

照.Definition: zhào - photograph; to illuminate; to shine

练习.Definition: liànxí - to practice, exercise, drill, practice

了解.Definition: liǎojiě - to understand, to realize, to find out

满意.Definition: mǎnyì - satisfied, pleased, to one's satisfaction

难过.Definition: nánguò - to feel sad, to feel unwell, (of life) to be difficult

年级.Definition: niánjí - grade, year (in school, college etc)

较.Definition: jiào - to compare, compared to, relatively

注.Definition: zhù - to pour, to concentrate, to explain

努力.Definition: nǔlì - great effort, to strive, to try hard

选.Definition: xuǎn - to choose, to pick, to select, to elect

其他.Definition: qítā - other, (sth or sb) else, the rest

请假.Definition: qǐngjià - to request leave of absence

段.Definition: duàn - paragraph, section, segment, classifier for periods of time

认为.Definition: rènwèi - to believe, to think, to consider, to feel

认真.Definition: rènzhēn - conscientious, earnest, serious, to take seriously

如果.Definition: rúguǒ - if, in case, in the event that

育.Definition: yù - to have children, to raise or bring up, to educate

船.Definition: chuán - boat, vessel, ship, CL:條|条[tiao2],艘[sou1],隻|只[zhi1]

刚.Definition: gāng - just; only a short while ago

怕.Definition: pà - to fear; to be afraid of

提高.Definition: tígāo - to improve; to raise; to heighten

同意.Definition: tóngyì - to agree, to consent, to approve

居.Definition: jū - to reside, residence, classifier for bedrooms

句.Definition: jù - sentence, classifier for phrases or lines of verse

习惯.Definition: xíguàn - habit, custom, usual practice, to be used to

洗澡.Definition: xǐzǎo - to bathe, to take a shower

相信.Definition: xiāngxìn - to be convinced (that sth is true), to believe

皮.Definition: pí - leather, skin, fur, CL:張|张[zhang1]

啊.Definition: a - (a sentence-final particle of exlamation, interrogation, etc.)

校长.Definition: xiàozhǎng - (college, university) president, headmaster, CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]

需要.Definition: xūyào - to need, to want, to demand, to require, requirement, need

选择.Definition: xuǎnzé - to select, to pick, choice, option

酒.Definition: jǐu - wine, liquor, spirits, CL:杯[bei1],瓶[ping2],罐[guan4],桶[tong3],缸[gang1]

要求.Definition: yàoqíu - to request, to demand, CL:點|点[dian3]

顾.Definition: gù - to look after; to attend to

一边.Definition: yībiān - one side, either side, on the one hand, doing while

画.Definition: huà - to draw, picture, painting, CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]

照顾.Definition: zhàogu - to look after; to care for; to attend to

瘦.Definition: shòu - thin; slim (usually of a person or animal); lean
